news.title: Threads is developing in-message games
news.summary: Launching in-message games would give Threads an edge over competitors like X and Bluesky, which don’t offer built-in games.

news.title: Commonwealth Fusion Systems installs reactor magnet, lands deal with Nvidia
news.summary: The fusion power frontrunner said that construction on its Sparc reactor was proceeding as planned. Meanwhile, it's building a digital twin to help dial it in.

news.title: Meta pauses international expansion of its Ray-Ban Display glasses
news.summary: Meta had originally planned to launch the glasses in France, Italy, Canada, and the U.K. in early 2026.

news.title: Amazon’s Ring doorbells get fire alerts, an app store, and new sensors
news.summary: The new Ring Sensors can detect motion, openings, glass breakage, and smoke, and can also monitor carbon monoxide levels, leaks, temperature changes, and air quality.

news.title: Narwal adds AI to its vacuum cleaners to monitor pets and find jewelry
news.summary: Narwal's new robo vacuum cleaner switches to quiet mode near a baby's crib.

news.title: Power bank feature creep is out of control
news.summary: There was a time not too long ago when buying a power bank was as easy as choosing the cheapest portable battery that could charge your phone and quickly slip into your pocket, purse, or backpack. news.title: This 16-inch laptop is so light I can easily lift it with three fingers
news.summary: Asus' Zenbook A14 that debuted at last year's CES is now getting a bigger sibling for CES 2026. The new Asus Zenbook A16 is a 16-inch counterpart to refreshed Zenbook A14, both packing Qualcomm Snapdragon X2 Elite processors. news.title: Asus’ Zenbook Duo dual-screen laptop gets Intel’s new chip and a more seamless hinge
news.summary: The Asus Zenbook Duo is getting a chip upgrade, an overhauled hinge design, and a big battery upgrade for CES 2026. news.title: Asus made a GoPro-inspired ProArt PX13 laptop
news.summary: Asus is announcing a new ProArt PX13 convertible laptop and ProArt PZ14 detachable tablet for CES 2026. The PX13 comes in two versions: a standard model and a GoPro Edition. news.title: Roborock launches its first robot lawn mower in the US
news.summary: Roborock is finally bringing its bots to yards in the US, several months after expanding into robot lawn mowers last year. news.title: Appeals court upholds block on one of Trump’s cuts to research funds
news.summary: The Trump admin can't arbitrarily set university reimbursements to a low flat rate.

news.title: Nvidia’s new G-Sync Pulsar monitors target motion blur at the human retina level
news.summary: Four new monitors promise "effective motion clarity of a theoretical 1,000 Hz monitor."

news.title: Ørsted seeks injunction against US government over project freeze
news.summary: Trump administration had suspended Danish group’s work on major wind farm off coast of Rhode Island.

news.title: Ring and Watch Duty Team Up to Keep a Closer Eye on Wildfires
news.summary: In a move to help alert people to the spread of nearby blazes, Ring is partnering with Watch Duty to let users share their videos on the wildfire tracking app.

news.title: Steve Jobs’ Early Apple Items Are Going Up for Auction—Along With His Bow Ties
news.summary: Some of the objects came from Steve Jobs’ childhood bedroom. They’re being made available by his stepbrother, John Chovanec.
